Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc26
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc26.model.card_side

Class Side

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc26.model.card_side.Side
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
CardBack, GoldCardFront, MissionCardFront, ResourceCardFront, StarterCardFront
public abstract class Side extends Object implements Serializable
This abstract class represents a Side, two Sides form a Card
See Also:

  • Method Details

    • calculatePoints

      protected int calculatePoints(int firstX, int firstY, int secondX, int secondY, ArrayList<Point> occupiedPositions, Symbol diagSymbol, Symbol vertSymbol, int flag, int points)
      This method returns the points that a Mission cards gives based on the Player's board
      Parameters:
      firstX - X coordinate of the first card
      firstY - Y coordinate of the first card
      secondX - X coordinate of the second card
      secondY - Y coordinate of the second card
      occupiedPositions - Position occupied by Player's cards in the Player's Board
      diagSymbol - Symbol that represent the cards to be checked
      vertSymbol - Symbol that represent the cards to be checked
      flag - flag that equals true if the card has already been count in a pattern
      points - points given for every combination found
      Returns:
      total points given by this card

    • useAbility

      public int useAbility(Map<Symbol,Integer> resources, ArrayList<Point> occupiedPositions, Point p)
      This method returns the points for abilities
      Parameters:
      resources - Resources required to use the ability
      occupiedPositions - list of occupied position in the Player's board
      p - point where the card is placed
      Returns:
      total point for the ability

    • checkPattern

      public int checkPattern(Map<Symbol,Integer> resources, ArrayList<Point> occupiedPositions)
      This method returns the extra points that are awarded considering the card position in the Player's board.
      Parameters:
      resources - Player's visible resources in the board
      occupiedPositions - list of the position occupied in the Player's board
      Returns:
      points given by this card

    • checkSideSymbol

      public boolean checkSideSymbol(Symbol sideSymbol)
      Returns true if the sideSymbol (the card's kingdom) equals the parameter given
      Parameters:
      sideSymbol - symbol to check against the actual side's symbol
      Returns:
      boolean
